ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Select either Yes or No to indicate whether there was a change in dosing.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Typically, the intent/purpose of collecting this field is to help with data cleaning and monitoring as it provides a definitive response regarding any dose changes. It provides verification that the associate field on the CRF (EXADJ) was deliberately left blank. However, the sponsor may collect whether the dose was adjusted, without collecting the reason for the change.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Not Applicable
ReferenceDocuments.description: When EXADJ is collected, does not map to an SDTMIG variable. The SDTM Annotated CRF is annotated to indicate that this field is NOT SUBMITTED. When EXADJ is not collected, the sponsor may submit this variable as a SUPPQ.
